deity_markdown: [Arshea](/Deities.aspx?ID=465), [Faith In The Fallen](/Deities.aspx?ID=367), [Gogunta](/Deities.aspx?ID=321), [Irori](/Deities.aspx?ID=286), [Jin Li](/Deities.aspx?ID=308), [Kabriri](/Deities.aspx?ID=432), [Sun Wukong](/Deities.aspx?ID=316), [The Divine Dare](/Deities.aspx?ID=269)
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 1" pfs="Standard">
[Jump](/Spells.aspx?ID=1580)
<actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Move" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=114" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 340 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Deities**
[Arshea](/Deities.aspx?ID=465), [Faith In The Fallen](/Deities.aspx?ID=367), [Gogunta](/Deities.aspx?ID=321), [Irori](/Deities.aspx?ID=286), [Jin Li](/Deities.aspx?ID=308), [Kabriri](/Deities.aspx?ID=432), [Sun Wukong](/Deities.aspx?ID=316), [The Divine Dare](/Deities.aspx?ID=269)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

Your legs surge with strength, ready to leap high and far. You jump 30 feet in any direction without touching the ground. You must land on a space of solid ground within 30 feet of you, or else you fall after using your next action.

---
**Heightened (3rd)** The range becomes touch, the target changes to one touched creature, and the duration becomes 1 minute, allowing the target to jump as described whenever it takes the [Leap](/Actions.aspx?ID=81) action.
name: Jump
search_markdown:
<traits>
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Move" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=114" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 340 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Deities**
[Arshea](/Deities.aspx?ID=465), [Faith In The Fallen](/Deities.aspx?ID=367), [Gogunta](/Deities.aspx?ID=321), [Irori](/Deities.aspx?ID=286), [Jin Li](/Deities.aspx?ID=308), [Kabriri](/Deities.aspx?ID=432), [Sun Wukong](/Deities.aspx?ID=316), [The Divine Dare](/Deities.aspx?ID=269)

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

<row gap="medium">
 

 

 
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 
</row>
</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Make an impressive leap.
</summary>
text: Jump Single Action Source Player Core pg. 340 2.0 Traditions Arcane, Primal Deities Arshea, Faith In The Fallen, Gogunta, Irori, Jin Li, Kabriri, Sun Wukong, The Divine Dare --- Your legs surge with strength, ready to leap high and far. You jump 30 feet in any direction without touching the ground. You must land on a space of solid ground within 30 feet of you, or else you fall after using your next action. --- Heightened (3rd) The range becomes touch, the target changes to one touched creature, and the duration becomes 1 minute, allowing the target to jump as described whenever it takes the Leap action.
